The claim was fact: checked by conducting a quick Google search, which revealed several news articles and fact-checks debunking the claim.
The official Olive Garden Twitter accoun: stating that the information was incorrect and that the company does not donate to presidential candidates.
The parent company of Olive Garden: Darden Restaurants, also denied the claim, stating that they do not donate to any federal or presidential candidates.
The campaign finance database: OpenSecrets.org, was consulted to examine any donations made by Darden Restaurants. The database showed that the company had not made any contributions to President Trump's re-election campaign or any other candidate during the 2020, 2018, and 2016 election cycles.
